mapper.sql: SELECT DISTINCT u.user_id AS user_id, ap.app_id AS app_id, m.resource_id AS resource_id, m.application_id AS application_id, m.name AS name, m.description AS description, m.code AS code, m.parent_code AS parent_code, m.status AS status FROM gar_users u, gar_user_application ap, gar_user_dept ud, gar_role_dept rd, gar_role_permission rp, gar_permissions p, gar_resources m WHERE m.status = 1 AND p.status = 1 AND ap.user_id = u.user_id AND ud.user_id = u.user_id AND rd.dept_id = ud.dept_id AND rp.role_id = rd.role_id AND p.permission_id = rp.permission_id AND m.path LIKE p.wildcard
mapper.select: SELECT ur.code FROM () AS ur WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND ur.app_id = #{appId}
